nodes.text: Poloda Place was an apartment building on Coruscant that was known as an artists' colony due to the fact that people such as award-winning author Kai Konnik, famous Fondorian composer Metrisse, and Twi'lek dancer Nar Chan lived there.
Shortly after solving the case of Ves Volette's murder, Jax Pavan and his group resided there for a short while before being discovered by the Inquisitorius.
